description: This header file declares functions related to DCA (possibly Data Collection/Analysis) results management, including functions to retrieve results in JSON format or within a Vector structure, as well as utility functions like string splitting and error code extraction.

methods.name: getDCAResultsInJson
methods.description: Retrieves DCA results for a given profile in JSON format, expects a list of markers and returns the result in a cJSON object.

methods.name: getDCAResultsInVector
methods.description: Retrieves DCA results for a profile and stores them in a Vector structure.

methods.name: strSplit
methods.description: Splits a string based on a delimiter.

methods.name: getErrorCode
methods.description: Extracts an error code from a string.
